TrainingElement.Name: Group or List
TrainingElement.Title: Group or List
TrainingElement.BodyCopy:
Content fields can be grouped together to help determine a common relationship. In many cases features and items within web pages can require multiple content fields to function, and these content fields would be placed within a group.

Lists

   A common group of items is a list. A list contains one content field type in which the number of content fields can increase or decrease in number. You can insert or remove content fields by clicking on the "+" and "-" buttons on the right of each content field.

Groups

   Unlike lists, groups can have more than one content field type, yet groups will have a fixed number of content fields.

Interface

   Group and list items are stored in a collapsible window. Clicking the arrow on the top right corner will collapse or expand the window.
